plot: Richard road tests the new Volkswagen Touareg as well as having race against two snowmobile racers in a customized Volkwagen Touareg (the one used in the Dakar Rally). James tests the new Bugatti Veyron Supersport and attempts to take it to its top speed of 258mph. Tom Cruise and Cameron Diaz are the Stars In A Reasonably Priced Car.—Caboose
